name: Untitled Frog Game (Demo)
description:
Hello, here is a choose your own adventure game made by me! Its the result of me trying to learn html. I feel like I've learned nothing but at least the frogs turned out cute :3

This game is a demo at the moment, I plan to add way more options over time.

Thank you Hagefade for giving me helps and advice! Check Hagefade out here:

https://www.twitch.tv/hagefade
